description: Erection of part 22 storey, part 7 storey over basement building comprising fitness centre use at basement level (D2), flexible retail uses at ground floor level (A1/A3/A4), office use at ground to sixth floor level (B1) and 100 Private Rented Sector residential units on the upper floors (C3); provision of communal terrace and gardens at sixth and seventh floor level; provision of ancillary services and residential facilities and plant, cycle parking and associated works.
